content: Set an alternative URL address for your space. Send your request to our support team to get help with the settings.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a button or link that allows users to set an alternative URL address for their space. It provides instructions on how to send a request to support for assistance with DNS settings. This text appears in a dialog box or settings page, likely within the PortalSettings category of customization options.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Domeniniz' (Your Domain) is used. The English content refers to a 'space', not necessarily a domain. While it might be contextually acceptable, it's a potential mistranslation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more general term for 'space' that translates to something like 'bəzəyin' (your area/space) or 'sahəniz' (your area/space), depending on the intended meaning.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Parametrlərlə bağlı kömək' translates to 'help with parameters', 'settings' is a better equivalent given the English source.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'Parametrlərlə bağlı kömək' with 'Parametrlərə görə kömək' or 'Parametrlərə kömək'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "asetusten kanssa" is a bit awkward. It literally translates to "with the settings". A more natural Finnish phrasing would be "asetusten kanssa apua" (help with the settings) or simply "asetuksissa" (in the settings).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aseta vaihtoehtoinen URL-osoite tilallesi. Lähetä pyyntö tukitiimillemme saadaksesi apua asetuksissa.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "get help with the settings" is not accurately translated. "Obtenir de l'aide sur des réglages" is too literal and sounds unnatural in French. A better phrasing would convey the meaning of getting assistance with configuring the settings.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Obtenir de l'aide pour la configuration des réglages.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon after "տարածքի համար" is unnecessary and disrupts the flow. It should be removed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ուղարկեք ձեր հարցումը մեր աջակցման թիմին՝ կարգավորումների հետ կապված օգնություն ստանալու համար:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Set an alternative URL address for your space" is not accurately translated. "設定してください" implies a command, but a more polite phrasing would be better suited for a setting description. It should convey that the user *can* set an alternative URL, rather than being told to do so.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: あなたのスペースの代替URLアドレスを設定可能です。 (Anata no space no dai-go URL adoresu o setto kanou desu.) - This translates to 'You can set an alternative URL address for your space.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Send your request to our support team' is a bit stiff. 'リクエストを送信してください' is grammatically correct, but a more natural phrasing exists.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 設定についてのお手伝いが必要な場合は、弊社のサポートチームにお問い合わせください。 (Settingo ni tsuite no otetsudai ga hitsuyou na baai wa, heisha no sapooto chiimu ni o-toiawase kudasai.) - This translates to 'If you need help with the settings, please contact our support team.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'alternative URL address' is not accurately translated. '대체 URL 주소' is technically correct but could be more naturally expressed as '다른 URL 주소'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 다른 URL 주소를 설정하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Set an alternative URL address for your space" is not perfectly captured. "ກໍານົດທີ່ຢູ່ URL ທາງເລືອກສໍາລັບພື້ນທີ່ຂອງທ່ານ" is a literal translation but might be more naturally expressed in Lao as something like "ຕັ້ງທີ່ຢູ່ URL ທາງເລືອກສໍາລັບພື້ນທີ່ຂອງທ່ານ" or "ກໍານົດທີ່ຢູ່ URL ແບບອື່ນສໍາລັບພື້ນທີ່ຂອງທ່ານ".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider revising to "ຕັ້ງທີ່ຢູ່ URL ທາງເລືອກສໍາລັບພື້ນທີ່ຂອງທ່ານ" or "ກໍານົດທີ່ຢູ່ URL ແບບອື່ນສໍາລັບພື້ນທີ່ຂອງທ່ານ".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Send your request to our support team to get help with the settings" is translated as "ສົ່ງຄໍາຮ້ອງຂໍຂອງທ່ານໄປຫາທີມງານສະຫນັບສະຫນູນຂອງພວກເຮົາເພື່ອຂໍຄວາມຊ່ວຍເຫຼືອໃນການຕັ້ງຄ່າ". While technically correct, it might read more naturally as "ຕິດຕໍ່ທີມງານສະຫນັບສະຫນູນຂອງພວກເຮົາເພື່ອຂໍຄວາມຊ່ວຍເຫຼືອໃນການຕັ້ງຄ່າ" or "ຕິດຕໍ່ພວກເຮົາເພື່ອຂໍຄວາມຊ່ວຍເຫຼືອໃນການຕັ້ງຄ່າ".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider revising to "ຕິດຕໍ່ທີມງານສະຫນັບສະຫນູນຂອງພວກເຮົາເພື່ອຂໍຄວາມຊ່ວຍເຫຼືອໃນການຕັ້ງຄ່າ" or "ຕິດຕໍ່ພວກເຮົາເພື່ອຂໍຄວາມຊ່ວຍເຫຼືອໃນການຕັ້ງຄ່າ".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'vietrāža' is not the most accurate translation of 'URL address' in this context. 'URL adrese' is more standard and widely understood.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Iestatiet savai telpai alternatīvu URL adresi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "pomoc z konfiguracją" is a bit awkward and not the most natural way to express "help with the settings." It's overly literal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Wyślij prośbę do naszego działu wsparcia, aby uzyskać pomoc w ustawieniach.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ajutorul de setare' is not the best translation for 'help with the settings'. It literally translates to 'the help of setting'. A better translation would be 'asistență pentru configurare'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Trimiteţi solicitarea către echipa noastră de asistenţă, pentru a obține asistență pentru configurare.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'alternative URL address' is not accurately translated. 'ඒ.ස.නි. ලිපිනයක්' (A.S.N. Lipinayak) literally translates to ASN address, which isn't a common term for a URL.  A more appropriate translation would convey the meaning of a 'different website address' or 'alternative web address'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබගේ අවකාශය සඳහා වෙනත් වෙබ් ලිපිනයක් සකසන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be improved for better flow. The current translation sounds a bit abrupt.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබගේ අවකාශය සඳහා වෙනත් වෙබ් ලිපිනයක් සකසන්න. මෙම සැකසුම් පිළිබඳව උදවු ලබා ගැනීමට, ඔබේ ඉල්ලුම අපගේ සහාය කණ්ඩායමට යවන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Set an alternative URL address for your space" is not perfectly translated. "Поставите" (Postavite) can imply a more technical setting or configuration that a casual user might not understand. A more user-friendly phrasing would be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Подесите алтернативну URL адресу за ваш простор.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the use of a period after "подешавањима" feels slightly abrupt in this context. A more natural flow might benefit from a different punctuation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Подесите алтернативну URL адресу за ваш простор. Пошаљите ваш захтев нашем тиму за подршку како бисте добили помоћ са подешавањима.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Postavite alternativnu URL adresu" translates more literally to "Set an alternative URL address". While understandable, a more natural Serbian phrasing would be "Odredite alternativnu URL adresu" or "Unesite alternativnu URL adresu".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Odredite alternativnu URL adresu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "pomoć sa podešavanjima" is grammatically correct, but "pomoć u podešavanjima" sounds more natural and idiomatic in Serbian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: pomoć u podešavanjima

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'alternative URL address' is not perfectly conveyed by 'alternatif bir URL adresi'. While understandable, a more precise translation would emphasize the use of a custom or non-standard URL.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Alanınız için özel veya farklı bir URL adresi ayarlayın.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'get help with the settings' is translated as 'Ayarlarla ilgili yardım almak için'. A more natural and user-friendly translation would be 'ayarlar konusunda yardım almak için'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ayarlar konusunda yardım almak için

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Send your request to our support team' is translated as '向我们的支持团队发送请求'. While technically correct, it sounds slightly formal and unnatural in modern Chinese for a user interface setting description. A more natural phrasing would emphasize getting help directly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 向我们的支持团队寻求帮助 (Xiàng wǒmen de zhīchí tuánduì xúnqiú bāngzhù) - 'Seek help from our support team'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '关于设置方面的帮助' is a bit clunky. It's implying help *regarding* the settings. It's better to simplify it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 关于设置的帮助 (Guānyú shèzhì de bāngzhù) - 'Help with the settings'
